document.description: Go in, order at the counter and then wait to be called. Eat good pizza on paper ... chunks. no onions, peppers, etc. if your in the area then fine but don't waste...

Home > United States > Massachusetts (MA) > Cape Cod > Harwich Port > Harwich Port Restaurants > George's Pizza House
All 17 Harwich Port Restaurants» George's Pizza House 564 Main St , Harwich Port , MA 02646-1840 (508) 432-3144 Got a photo? Add it. Ranked #13 of 17 restaurants in Harwich Port 15 Reviews Price range: $5 - $10 Cuisines: Fast Food Restaurant details Update restaurant details Write a Review 15 reviews from our community 60% Recommend Excellent 6 Very good 3 Average 3 Poor 2 Terrible 1 Rating summary Food Service Value Atmosphere 15 reviews sorted by Date Rating English first Any Sanzibar Adelaide, Australia Senior Contributor 37 reviews Reviews in 10 cities 7 helpful votes “Grumpy service but great pizza” Reviewed June 18, 2012 Must have been a long day for the guy who served us who was somewhat grumpy and unhelpful. But the pizza selection was good, and the Mediterranean pizza we ordered was delicious. Good value as well. Tables and chairs available for those who want to eat in. Open seven days a week till late, and they deliver too. Was this review helpful? Yes Problem with this review? See 2 more reviews by Sanzibar for Harwich Port jonesmen New York Contributor 20 reviews Reviews in 9 cities 2 helpful votes “Our first night dinner every year” Reviewed May 25, 2012 This is our first night dinner every year when we stay in Chatham. Great pizza and VERY reasonable! Was this review helpful? Yes Problem with this review? Sylvie L Manchester, Connecticut, United States Reviewer 5 reviews 1 helpful vote “Calzones and pizza” Reviewed April 30, 2012 This restaurant was recommended by the manager at Seadar Inn and it did not disappoint. Had a meatball calzone which was oozing with cheese and loaded with sliced meatballs. They deliver too! Was this review helpful? Yes Problem with this review? See 4 more reviews by Sylvie L for Harwich Port daisymae531 Minneapolis, MN Senior Contributor 25 reviews Reviews in 10 cities 11 helpful votes “terrible pizza” Reviewed February 11, 2012 worst pizza we have ever had in our lives, did not offer normal toppings, only anchovies, and other odd mixtures, terrible sauces and crust, cheese bread wasn't even good, expensive, do not waste your money, Was this review helpful? Yes Problem with this review? OldWorldRomantic Reading, Massachusetts Senior Contributor 24 reviews Reviews in 16 cities 30 helpful votes “Very good pizzas” Reviewed December 9, 2011 Quick call during half time of the Patriots game, Two pizzas as good as any I have had. Was this review helpful? Yes Problem with this review? blakescholar USA Contributor 17 reviews Reviews in 13 cities 19 helpful votes “Exceptional pizza - a Harwich Port tradition” Reviewed July 26, 2011 My wife and I happened upon George's for two reasons: they advertised in the Harwich Mariners'yearbook, and they were open after the game let out. The restaurant was doing quite a lot of business for a late Sunday night (take out, delivery and eat in) so we had to wait a bit for our pizza, but it was worth... More Was this review helpful? Yes Problem with this review? vanMommy austin Reviewer 5 reviews Reviews in 3 cities 5 helpful votes “Don't expect Jersey type pizza...” Reviewed June 30, 2011 We were hoping for something different based on the reviews. It was like Chicago-esque type crust. Thick crust that was very crunchy from having a pan full of oil. We were all expecting Jersey/NY type pizza. That said, it was still pretty good, just not what we expected. Ingredients were fresh. Was this review helpful? Yes Problem with this review? down_2_earth96 Boston, Massachusetts Senior Reviewer 9 reviews Reviews in 9 cities 4 helpful votes “AMAZING” Reviewed April 22, 2011 Such great pizza. Service is wonderful, just go right up to the counter when your number is called. Have been going here for 10 years and counting. The pizza is the perfect blend of sauce and cheese. Was this review helpful? Yes Problem with this review? meemsikins99 Montreal, Canada Senior Reviewer 9 reviews Reviews in 6 cities 7 helpful votes “Fastfood pizza” Reviewed July 29, 2010 Go in, order at the counter and then wait to be called. Eat good pizza on paper plates. Pizza was very good. Was this review helpful? Yes Problem with this review? lara5727 cape cod 1 review “totally average” Reviewed May 13, 2009 after reading reviews on how this place was much better then the closer by pizza joints we decided to make the 20 minute drive for it. we were disappointed. it was totally average. we had pizza and salads. the salad was lame. iceberg and tomato chunks. no onions, peppers, etc. if your in the area then fine but don't waste... More Was this review helpful? Yes Problem with this review? 1-10 of 15 reviews « 1 2 » Travelers who viewed George's Pizza House also viewed Cape Sea Grille 72 Reviews Harwich Port, Cape Cod
